channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Foundation Housing, Off-Campus Commons to Co-Host Housing Info Session
item.description: Date: Wednesday, November 20, 2024 11:30 AM - 2:00 PM - Foundation Housing and Off-Campus Commons are excited to give students this opportunity to meet Associate Dean of Off-Campus Commons Graham Knowles, ask questions, and explore what makes Foundation houses an ideal off-campus living option for students. What’s more, Foundation Housing has partnered with Chipotle and Chick-fil-A to offer free food to students while they get all the details on Foundation Housing options for next year!
item.author: Students

item.title: Gateway Shuttles to be Available for Thanksgiving Holiday
item.description: Rensselaer’s Department of Parking and Transportation is pleased to announce that it will once again be offering Gateway shuttle transportation to and from regional destination points — including the Albany International Airport, Albany bus terminal, and the Amtrak train station — for the upcoming Thanksgiving holiday. All reservations must be received by Wednesday, November 20, so be sure to sign up ASAP!
item.author: Students

item.title: Women’s Mentoring Program to Host Thanksgiving Dinner
item.description: Date: Friday, November 22, 2024 5:45 PM - Join the Women’s Mentoring Program as they host a Thanksgiving dinner featuring free food, Jeopardy, and crafts, as well as keynote speaker Dr. Shayla Sawyer, who will talk about Insight and Inspiration. Please register by Friday, November 15 so we can get a head count and cater to all food preferences and allergies!
item.author: Students

item.title: Game Dev Club to Host November Game Jam
item.description: RPI’s Game Dev Club is hosting its third Game Jam of the semester starting at 5PM Friday, November 15 in Sage 2411! Please join them once again (or for the first time!) for a 48-hour jam, with overnight breaks beginning at 10:00 PM on both Friday and Saturday nights and doors re-opening at 8:00 AM each morning. Teams will be formed to design their own game from scratch; students of all years, areas of study, and experience levels are welcome to participate!
item.author: Students

item.title: Spring 2025 Arch Away Registration to be Held November 20
item.description: Do you have your Spring 2025 Arch Away registered? If you need help discussing your opportunities, reviewing application materials, or discussing other options, stop by the CCPD on November 20 between 1 and 3 PM!
item.author: Students

item.title: CMDIS Annual Research Symposium Scheduled for November 22
item.description: Date: Friday, November 22, 2024 8:30 AM - 6:00 PM - The Center for Materials, Devices and Integrated Systems is pleased to host its annual Research Symposium, and invites all faculty, visiting scholars, researchers, graduate students, facility users and undergraduate researchers to register to participate! Breakfast and lunch will be provided, and an award ceremony and reception will follow the event.
item.author: Community

item.title: Nominations Now Open for Phalanx Honor Society
item.description: Date: Monday, November 25, 2024 12:00 AM - Nominations are now open for the Phalanx Honor Society, which has been active for over 100 years with the purpose of recognizing students, faculty, and staff who exemplify the three pillars of Leadership, Service, and Devotion to the Alma Mater. From now through November 25, please consider taking a moment to nominate a peer, colleague or friend for this special honor!…
item.author: Community

item.title: DevFest 2024 Slated for November 16
item.description: Date: Saturday, November 16, 2024 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM - Join Rensselaer’s Computer Science department for this year’s DevFest software development conference, which will feature great talks about emerging technologies around AI and other developer technologies, with speakers from all over talking about using AI in development, cloud computing, web development and machine learning.
item.author: Community

item.title: Rensselaer at Work to Host Systems Engineering & Technology Management Review
item.description: Date: Thursday, November 21, 2024 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM - Hosted by Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D., this information session focuses on Rensselaer’s flexible, project-based, online Systems Engineering and Technology Management graduate degree that will help prepare decision-makers with broader and deeper capabilities in leading dynamic organizations. Please register if you plan to attend.
item.author: Community

item.title: GrantForward Training Webinar Scheduled for November 18
item.description: Date: Monday, November 18, 2024 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM - Register to attend the Office for Research’s one-hour webinar with GrantForward, the funding search and recommendation service to which all Rensselaer faculty, staff, and students are currently subscribed and have access. It’s a great introduction for new GrantForward users or a refresher for existing ones!
item.author: Community

item.title: Event to Introduce Partnership between RPI and Albany Medical College Bioinformatics Core
item.description: Join us and Ramon Bossardi Ramos, PhD., Director of the Bioinformatics Core at Albany Medical College, at 2:00PM on Monday, November 18 in CBIS Bruggeman as Dr. Ramos introduces AMC’s newest research core and how it can enhance research across many disciplines at RPI. AMC and RPI are exploring a partnership that would allow researchers at either institution to use the RPI Genomics Core and the AMC Bioinformatics Core with internal rates.
item.author: Community

item.title: Nutrition Workshop to be Held November 21
item.description:
Date: Thursday, November 21, 2024 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM - Come to the Mueller Center classroom for a program that focuses on colorful and mindful eating! For more information, please stop by the Mueller Center or contact Lauren Arnoff.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Community
